forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy this morning, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming foggy and damp after midnight. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High around 20C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 67F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 43F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 51F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low around 5C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 41F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 53F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 4C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low near 40F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 39F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 4C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low around 40F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 4C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 39F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
